casebody.data:
Keith Alexander CRAVEN, Jr.
v.
Chasity Nicole DEMIDOVICH, Geico Indemnity Company, Alamo Financing, Orval K. Wing, Jr., Greensboro News and Record, and Allstate Insurance Company. No. 497P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, for Keith Alexander Craven, Jr. Torin L. Fury, Greensboro, for Chasity Demidovich, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of September 2005 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of November 2005."
